name: Frightening Ambush
text: You are able to leap from hiding and strike great fear in your opponents.
benefit: As a free action, you can attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize a flat-footed opponent you attack.
text_zh: 当你从藏身处一跃而出，敌人被吓得手足无措。
benefit_zh: 以一个自由动作，你可以对一个你所攻击的措手不及状态的目标发动一次威吓检定以挫败士气。
